attributes.action: water safety awareness to be apart of the curriculum in primary schools and high schools throughout the UK
attributes.additional_details: We are campaigning that water safety awareness be apart of our children's eductation throughout their education in primary school from year 5 and high school throughout the years. be it only in the summer months or throughout the year. Water Safety is paramount too our children so that they know the dangers of the water and how high risk the dangers or outdoor water is. I have no doubt that this will save lives.
